name: Rule Escaper Demo v.0.0.0.5
description:
Hello. Share for you my game project . Only for PC platform.

Game in alpha demo version )))

Leave your comment about this game. Thank everyone

In this version of game you can use hotkeys (1-8) to open current level in menu.

In Easy difficulty - you have Hp regen now is 1hp per 1 sec.

In Medium difficulty - you need hurry up ,because this regen become as damage!

-Hard and Impossible- now not have any level *in development*
